sentence.Network_en: We disdain a man for his snobbishness.
Maybe you have social faults such as snobbishness, talkativeness, and, etc. which drive away new acquaintances.
sentence.Network_cn: 也许你有社交方面的缺点,诸如势利 、 饶舌 、 出语粗俗等,使你的新相识退避三舍.

sentence.Network_en: He disdained that man for snobbishness and was unwilling to talk to him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他鄙视那个势利小人,不愿和他说话.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇新译 S_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... snobbish 势利的 snobbishness 势利 snobbism 势利.
势字的解释 ... 势利〖 snobbish〗 势利眼〖 snobbishness〗 势如破竹〖 smashintotheenemyterritorylikesplittingabamboo〗.

list.abs: " I am not a snobbish boss , " he said to Benjamin , " I'd like to help you out of trouble .我不是一个势利的老板，“他对本杰民说：”我愿意帮助你摆脱困境。“
Everyone was annoyed by his snobbish attitude ., 所有的每个人都对他势利的态度反感.
How to get a confidant in this snobbish practical society ?, 在这势力的现实社会何来知己?
He is a snobbish fellow , always talks through his nose ., 他是个势利鬼 , 经常摆架子.

entry.tran: (对自身社会地位、才智、品位等)过分自傲的，势利的
entry.def: If you describe someone as snobbish, you disapprove of them because they are too proud of their social status, intelligence, or taste.

example.ex: They had a snobbish dislike for their intellectual and social inferiors...
example.tran: 他们非常势利，不喜欢智力和社会地位不如自己的人。

example.ex: I'd expected her to be snobbish but she was warm and friendly.
example.tran: 我原以为她会非常势利，但她却非常热情和友好。

means.word_mean: 1. the trait of condescending to those of lower social status

auth_sentence.content: The snobbishness, too, has all but disappeared.
auth_sentence.res_content: The snobbishness, too, has all but disappeared.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The snobbishness, too, has all but disappeared.

auth_sentence.content: Your academic elitist snobbishness is also clear.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your academic elitist snobbishness is also clear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your academic elitist snobbishness is also clear.

auth_sentence.content: But amid all the rivalry, complacency and snobbishness, there was, by all accounts, a real work ethic.
auth_sentence.res_content: But amid all the rivalry, complacency and snobbishness, there was, by all accounts, a real work ethic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But amid all the rivalry, complacency and snobbishness, there was, by all accounts, a real work ethic.
